cause.description:
One in eight women will be affected by breast cancer at some point in their lifetime. We focus to encompass not only the Komen Foundation, but also other educational means dedicated to fighting breast cancer through education, awareness, and promoting breast health. ***100% of ALL donations are given to the Susan G. Komen Breast Cancer Foundation***
1. More people should be aware and educated about breast cancer.
2. One in eight women will be affected by breast cancer in their lifetime.
cause.mission: To help raise awareness of the seriousness of breast cancer and help fund research.
cause.name: ZTA - Breast Cancer Education & Awareness
